LanguageData.YanYu_WuShangLongSword.label: 舞殇长剑
LanguageData.YanYu_WuShangLongSword.description: 这是一柄泠月弟子专属的长剑，纤细锐利，优雅中不失锋芒，剑柄上刻着一轮弯月，
LanguageData.YanYu_HeiLongSword.label: 黑泷
LanguageData.YanYu_HeiLongSword.description: 沉若泷泉，锋锐无匹，尤擅破甲，重甲脆如纸
LanguageData.YanYu_YaJiuSword.label: 鸦九
LanguageData.YanYu_YaJiuSword.description: 形影如鸦，饮血不休，以血养身，愈战则愈勇
LanguageData.YanYu_ZiYangSword.label: 紫阳剑
LanguageData.YanYu_ZiYangSword.description: 温若日光，如沐紫气，养息真元，气血丹田生
LanguageData.YanYu_LvHouSword.label: 吕侯
LanguageData.YanYu_LvHouSword.description: 侠骨刚剑，力贯乾坤，破敌制胜，十步杀一人
